SPRITE ART BY: PROGRAMMER: MUSIC BY: TOOLS USED:" AZ RYUHEIDO(NISHINO RYUHEI) PIXEL STUDIO ANDROID STUDIO
HOW TO PLAY Move the orbs on screen by swiping LEFT, RIGHT, UP or DOWN. When 3 or more of the same orb types of made, they will disappear and points will be granted. You can move the orbs anywhere you like, however BE CAREFUL AS IT WILL COST YOU ONE TURN. The more orbs you match in a row, the more points will be granted. When the number of turns remaining reaches zero, game will end. If the total accumulated score is greater or equal to 4500, you win! Else you loseâ€¦ so choose your moves wisely!
